item.description:
We will be visiting an 8,000 year old neolithic site in Wayland Massachusetts!
Weather permitting.
There is a walk to the dig of about 200 yards 1/2 of which is up a sandy embankment.
We will meet at the Wayland Town Hall (intersections of rte 20 and 27/126) at 10:00am and then proceed to the dig site at 10:30.
Attendance is free.
Bring bug spray.
After the dig we may get together at a local restaurant for lunch.

I will be wearing my yellow T-shirt and ball cap.

Contact Will at 508-963-0805 for further information.

Thanks to Jill for arranging this!
item.name: Atheists Visit to an Archaeological dig
